query: "Can you tell me why I was placed in the prone position during my procedure on 11-29-2020?"
resource_summaries: This record documents a completed procedure where the subject was placed in a prone position at Mount Auburn Hospital on November 29, 2020, due to hypoxemia.
answer: You were placed in the prone position during your procedure on 11-29-2020 at Mount Auburn Hospital due to hypoxemia, which is low oxygen levels in the blood.
